emails.name: <link="18-1">Lynne Gordon</link>
emails.subject: <link="18-0">Dissolution of partnership</link>
emails.content:
I, Lynne Gordon, would like to withdrawal from the limited share arrangement between myself and Mr. Medlock, Formula Grey. The partnership was formed under the provision of a Partnership Agreement. I would like to no longer be associated with the company and have all assets of the partnership be distributed among partners.

Thank you,
Lynne Gordon

emails.name: <link="0-1">Tenneko IT</link>

emails.content:
<nobr><link="0-3">To all</link></nobr> Lawsy <nobr><link="0-4">account holders</link></nobr>,

Thanks for bearing with us, Tenneko IT.

emails.content:

<nobr><link="1-4">Thank you</link></nobr>,
Fern Williamson
